arts.ttl: Kiel victorious in seven-goal thriller against Gladbach
arts.sum: Shuto Machino's injury-time strike helped Holstein Kiel to a dramatic win over European hopefuls Borussia Mönchengladbach.

Holstein Kiel emerged victorious in a seven-goal thriller against Borussia Mönchengladbach at the Holstein-Stadion, securing a crucial 4-3 win in their battle against relegation. Shuto Machino starred with two goals, including a dramatic injury-time winner, in a superb match full of goals and some heroic goalkeeping.

arts.ttl: Holstein Kiel vs. Borussia Mönchengladbach preview: Pivotal clash at both ends of the table
arts.sum: In a pivotal Bundesliga clash that could shape both ends of the table, bottom-placed Holstein Kiel host European hopefuls Borussia Mönchengladbach at Holstein-Stadion on Saturday.

arts.ttl: Preview: Holstein Kiel vs. Borussia Monchengladbach - prediction, team news, lineups
arts.sum: Sports Mole previews Saturday's Bundesliga clash between Holstein Kiel and Borussia Monchengladbach, including predictions, team news and possible lineups.
